org.vanilladb.core.remote.jdbc

Class JdbcConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.vanilladb.core.remote.jdbc.ConnectionAdapter
      • org.vanilladb.core.remote.jdbc.JdbcConnection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AutoCloseable, Connection, Wrapper

    public class JdbcConnection
extends ConnectionAdapter
    An adapter class that wraps RemoteConnection. Its methods do nothing except transform RemoteExceptions into SQLExceptions.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface java.sql.Connection
